action.title: 冻结系统应用
action.desc: 把软件放入小黑屋，禁止运行
action.set: for i in $package; do adb2 -c pm disable-user $i; done

action.title: 冻结第三方应用
action.desc: 把软件放入小黑屋，禁止运行
action.set: for i in $package; do adb2 -c pm disable-user $i; done

action.title: 查看并恢复已冻结的应用①
action.desc: 默认勾选全部
action.set: for i in $package; do adb2 -c pm enable $i; done

action.title: 查看并恢复已冻结的应用②
action.desc: 默认不勾选
action.set: for i in $package; do adb2 -c pm enable $i; done

action.title: 自定义包名冻结、启用应用程序
action.desc: 用来冻结、启用（恢复）APK
action.set: if [[ -n $Freeze ]]; then for i in $Freeze; do adb2 -c pm disable-user $i; done; fi; if [[ -n $Enable ]]; then for o in $Enable; do adb2 -c pm enable $o; done; fi

param.name: Freeze
param.title: 请输入你要冻结的应用包名，多个包名请用输入法的回车键换行即可

param.name: Enable
param.title: 请输入你要启用（恢复）的应用包名，多个包名请用输入法的回车键换行即可

action.title: 暂停系统应用

action.title: 暂停第三方应用

action.set: if [[ -n $Suspend ]]; then for i in $Suspend; do adb2 -c pm suspend $i; done; fi; if [[ -n $Enable ]]; then for o in $Enable; do adb2 -c pm unsuspend $o; done; fi
